body:
Well, the code you point to selected 0 every time a 1 is generated. But actually, based on my limited understanding of the code, I think you do want to have (0,1] to be fed into the [binary search](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/e40425fd9b7290cbd0f98667664f442fc032044b/aten/src/THC/THCTensorRandom.cuh#L130-L139) to yield correct results and would have to change the bisection details if 0 is to be fed into the search (which is actually something to look at for half).
I'm also not particularly concerned about the skew in sampling because you would likely need a **lot** of samples before you have a statistically significant deviation.

Best regards

Thomas
